name: Elite Testimonials Slider Plugin For WordPress
author: Jannat Tech

sections.description:
“Elite Testimonials Slider Plugin For WordPress” is a WordPress plugin which create custom post type to add client’s testimonials to display anywhere on your business WordPress website using a simple shortcode.

Elite Testimonials Slider Plugin For WordPress plugin is pretty simple, flexible and user friednly with easy to use admin interface.

Plugin Features

  • Unlimited Shortcode

  • Responsive layout.

  • Very light weight.

  • 3 diffrenent layouts available.

  • Setting options to set up testimonial layout.(Fontsize,color selection,navigation on/off, auto play on/off, rattings setup etc)

  • Category based testimonial shortcode.

  • Testimonial with carousel slider

  • Setting to show number of testimonials per slide

  • Displaying Client Image, Designtation, Link(optional) with each Testimonial.

  • Its easy to use interface allows you to manage, edit, create, and delete Testimonials with no new knowledge

version 1.1

  • New style added

  • New options added to change slider traverse time and pagination speed

version 1.0

  • Initial release
sections.faq:
How do I add new Testimonial?

After activation once you redirect to the “Testimonials” Interface, click on “Add New Testimonial” First enter Client Name, Testimonial content, Client Designation or Company Name, Client’s profile/Company Link, Rating, upload the Client image to “Client Photo” section and Finally now you can published testimonial.

What will be the Author image dimension?

Better to add square size image. Default image size set to 150px X 150px.
